name: Meow Guardians
description:
“Meow Guardians” is an ARPG mobile game with a totally new battle style based on kitty heroes. If you are a fan of the cat in daily life, this game is a must-have for you because all heroes’ graphic is a cute cat. They are with fantastic skills and unique characteristics and waiting for your order! Deploy heroes with tactics to get more chance to break through and have more fun.

Features
An alliance is a center where players from the globe can communicate with each other about gaming experience to get their power to be raised and the character level upgraded fast! To get more gems, you can participate in the arena. The higher points you get, the more gems you will receive.
Participate in daily events can get lots of items. It’s very easy and simple. Once you complete main missions, you can take part in “Godsend Gift” to get massive coins by killing Slime.

There are more than 100 floors in the Big Tower, you can gain an award in every five floors once you defeat the BOSS on the fifth floor of each stage. The random special rewards will surprise you there. If you can climb to the top of the weekly rank, you will receive rich items.
Players can strengthen heroes by upgrading star. Get more heroes fragments to make your heroes powerful. It will assist you in the battle.

Besides, advance your mounts to gain more skills and earn super suits if you are lucky enough.
Let’s start exploring this fantasy journey in “Meow Guardians”!
